ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
 k = 'Shuew237HSFH242s';
var iv=String(result).substring(0, 16);
var data=String(result).substring(16);
aes=java.aesBase64DecodeToByteArray(data,k ,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", iv);
resize=Packages.cn.hutool.core.util.ArrayUtil.resize(aes,aes.length+1);
IoUtil=Packages.cn.hutool.core.io.IoUtil
a=Packages.java.util.zip.InflaterInputStream(IoUtil.toStream(resize));
IoUtil.read(a).toString();
</js>
$.data
